title: Python Fundamentals
goal: Understand the fundamentals of Python to build a solid foundation.

title: Introduction to Django
goal: Learn the basics of Django and set up a new project.

title: Django Models and Admin
goal: Learn to create and manage database models and use the Django admin.

title: Django Views and Templates
goal: Learn to create views and templates to render dynamic data.

title: Django Forms and Authentication
goal: Learn to create forms and handle user authentication.

title: Introduction to React
goal: Learn the fundamentals of React and how to build a basic application.

title: Connecting Django with React
goal: Learn how to connect a Django backend with a React frontend.

title: Introduction to PostgreSQL and Redis
goal: Learn the basics of PostgreSQL and Redis.

title: Introduction to Celery
goal: Learn how to use Celery for asynchronous tasks.

title: Introduction to Docker
goal: Learn how to containerize your application with Docker.

title: Data Analysis with Pandas and NumPy
goal: Learn the basics of data analysis with Pandas and NumPy.

title: Capstone Project
goal: Build a complete Python full-stack application from scratch.
